title: website navigation
body:
Why is the navigation on news so bad? there's no search nor proper links to categories
you have all these news categorised but you cannot specifically find a link to that category without finding a news page in that category and clicking the category link from there.
e.g. you want to find previous patch notes on the site, you have to find one specifically (most likely the recent 5.20) then you have scroll all the way to the social network buttons and click the patch notes category underneath that and then go through the pages until you find the one you want.

unless im not seeing it, someone tell me otherwise.

and ideally since you give a grid layout for some of the news on the main page why not keep that consistent when players browse the news sections. (pages like [all news](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news), [sales](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) ))
